title: Name Generation Checklist
description: Quality checklist for invented names: syllable count, first-letter conflicts, pronunciation test, Google check, and cultural consistency. Keep names short (1-3 syllables), simple, and pronounceable.

avoid_same_first_letter_as.description: Other names in the same story that start with the same letter

googled.description: Googled for existing meanings in other languages

culture_consistency_check.description: Consistent with the culture's naming conventions

apostrophe_justified.description: If apostrophes are used, what they represent (contraction, pronunciation guide)

x-cross-references.naming-convention: Culture naming conventions to check against
